about_the_game: Welcome to Maze Pursuit: The Roguelike Survival Odyssey, a game that seamlessly intertwines roguelike elements with narrative-driven gameplay. Embark on a gripping survivor's adventure spanning five chapters, where you assume the role of a tenacious post-apocalyptic hunter, navigating treacherous waves of zombies while simultaneously unraveling the earth-shattering conspiracy lurking beneath the apocalypse's surface.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains the blood burst effect when killing the enemy, if you feel uncomfortable, you can turn off in the Settings
